title: Quick Tab Sync Fixes v1.6.2.4
details:
## Critical Quick Tab Sync Bug Fixes

### Issue 1 & 5: Ghost Quick Tab Syndrome
- **Root Cause:** StateManager._processDeletedQuickTabs() incorrectly deleted Quick Tabs not in incoming sync array
- **Fix:** Made hydrate() additive by default (skipDeletions=true). Quick Tabs only deleted on explicit close events.
- **File:** src/features/quick-tabs/managers/StateManager.js

### Issue 2 & 6: Position Updates Lost
- **Root Cause:** UpdateHandler.applyPendingUpdates() never called after Quick Tab creation
- **Fix:** UICoordinator now accepts updateHandler and calls applyPendingUpdates(id) after render
- **Files:** UICoordinator.js, index.js

### Issue 4: Duplicate CREATE Messages
- **Root Cause:** Same CREATE_QUICK_TAB sent twice within 8ms
- **Fix:** Added message deduplication in QuickTabHandler (100ms window)
- **File:** src/background/handlers/QuickTabHandler.js

### Key Patterns
- Additive hydration prevents cross-tab sync from deleting local Quick Tabs
- UpdateHandler pending queue needs explicit application after window creation
- Message deduplication uses action+id key with timestamp tracking
